price: И поред Аллаха друге узимају за богове како би им они помогли;
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan laʿallahum yunṣarūna
